title: Modern 2BD House in Pennsport!
description:
This stunning 2BR 1BATH row home is fully renovated, located on a quiet block in the coveted Pennsport area of Philadelphia. The first floor is an open floor plan featuring a sun-filled living room, new flooring, and recessed lighting.  The modern kitchen features a breakfast bar with quartz countertops and new appliances.  The second floor features a lovely full bath with custom wallpaper and linen closet. Two nice-sized bedrooms await you, the master bedroom featuring an accent wall and both offering closet space.  The semi-finished basement offers a laundry area equipped with a washer and dryer and additional storage space.  The new Central AC and heat will keep you comfortable all year long!
1** Emily St. is conveniently located near multiple lines of public transportation, I-95, 76, and both The Walt Whitman and Ben Franklin Bridges.  Walking distance to many local bars, restaurants, gyms, parks, Target, Acme, Starbucks and much more!
Tenant is responsible for paying Gas/Electric/Water.

title: $500 security deposit! Available early July!
description:
$500 security deposit! Available early July. Welcome to 222 Rittenhouse, an architecturally historic high-rise tower on Rittenhouse Square. Beautifully situated on the west side of the Square, 222 offers revered park side living in Center City s most sought after neighborhood at a terrific value. This handsome 1920 s building welcomes residents with a stunning double height lobby. Choose from luxury studios, one, two and three-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses in a variety of distinctive floor plans. The apartments have been recently renovated to include new kitchen cabinets, countertops, appliances, fixtures and flooring and restored tile bathrooms. Units have central air, in-unit laundry, dishwashers and great closets! Many apartments enjoy views of beautiful Rittenhouse Square and the skyline of Philadelphia. Residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, fitness facility, business lounge and 24 - hour maintenance. The biggest amenity 222 provides is the unbeatable LOCATION. A short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. Just $500 Security Deposit and 1st month's rent to move-in! Pets allowed. Extra storage available. Bike storage on site.
222 W Rittenhouse Sq #1004

title: Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street!
description:
Welcome to el Magnet at 1141 N Front Street! This building is designed with modern touches and warm finishes. It features great amenities including a shared common roof deck with center city views, a bike room, elevator, and parking. The apartment features vinyl flooring throughout the unit with large windows for natural lighting. The kitchen is complemented with a quartz countertop and a beautiful backsplash that blends in perfectly with the white cabinets and makes the kitchen look very modern and clean. There is plenty of cabinet space and all the appliances you can ask for inside a unit including a microwave and an in-unit washer and dryer. With an awareness of the vibrant, surrounding neighborhood, the builder took great care to provide high-quality sound reducing windows and walls to provide a relaxing home environment. The building offers limited parking spots at an additional cost. About Fishtown and Northern Liberties: Located in the heart of Fishtown, just a half block off of Girard Ave and two blocks from Frankford Ave. 1141 N Front is walking distance of the best dining and entertainment around: The Fillmore, Fette Sau, Frankford Hall, Johnny Brenda's, Mulherin's, Sugarhouse, the Piazza at Schmidt's, and much more. Steps to public transit options - the Market-Frankford Line, the Girard trolley, and SEPTA buses as well as quick access to I-95 and Columbus Ave.

title: Recently rehabbed Row with two car parking in Fishtown!
description:
Recently rehabbed Row with two car parking in Fishtown. This 3 bed 2.5 bath town house was rehabbed just over a year ago with hardwood floors, new kitchen and bathrooms. Lower level includes an attached garage that open into a finished lower level family room/den/office/playroom with a powder room and a sliding door that leads to a very large maintenance free back yard/patio. Second floor has an open floor plan with living/dining area large brand new kitchen with ceramic tiles, new cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Behind the kitchen is the third bedroom that could be used as an office. Third floor has two nice sized bedrooms with a full bath with tub/shower ceramic tiles and vanity with granite countertop. This property is one block from the corner Girard and Frankford Ave. right in the heart of Fishtown and its restaurants and shops. Found the corner from the Girard Trolley, Market-Frankfort Line. Easy access to I95. Blocks away from Northern Liberties, The Piazza, and Acme.
1215 Crease St

title: Affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square!
description:
Location Location Location! Available 08/1/2023. 20th & Walnut - only a 2 min walk to Rittenhouse Square, bars, restaurants, shops, historic places & more! This building is perfectly situated close to all the best spots in Philly, major universities, highways & whatever you can imagine. 2010 Walnut St was built in 1860 and was originally owned by the Wilkinson Sword Blade family. In recent decades, Eberhardt's Antiques operated out of the first floor. Now it is your chance to rent this amazing, affordable 1-bed apartment in the heart of Rittenhouse Square! When you walk into the building, you will be amazed by the preserved historic details and gorgeous mirrors throughout the hallway. The building has a big shared rooftop with sublime views of the city! The apartment is located on the basement level of the building and has a small outdoor space! The details of the building will make every day walking in that hallway feel like a special occasion! The apartment can fit easily all of your furniture and you can comfortably host all of your friends and family. The bedroom has a spacious closet with an organizer, and space for a full/queen bed, desk, dresser, and more. It has stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, central AC & Heating, a beautiful bathroom, and an in-unit washer & dryer! The only con is that there is not much natural light. It will be professionally cleaned before the new tenant's move-in date. Water is included in the rent. Pets are ok with a pet deposit and under 50 pounds. Inquire about the video tour! First, and last & security to move in. 700+ credit score & 3x the rent income required to move in. No Airbnb arbitrage. Inquire about other units that we have available in this beautiful building!
2010 Walnut St #B01

title: Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living!
description:
Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living in this 1-Bedroom 1-Bathroom on the 18th floor of The Ellington! This spacious home offers wonderful light and city views from the oversized windows, an abundance of storage throughout the home, and an in-unit washer and dryer. You enter the home through a foyer with a hanging closet that leads you to the generous living/dining room. The kitchen is outfitted with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and an abundance of cabinet and counter space. The large bedroom offers a deep double closet and even more incredible city views. The bathroom is off the bedroom and offers a linen closet, tile floors, and a combination shower/tub. 1-year lease is required. Tenant is responsible for electricity and internet/cable TV. Tenant can have cats. Fees include a $300 move-in fee and $200 lease fee to the Ellington. The Ellington is a high-rise on the 1500 block of Chestnut St. The building offers a 24-hour door person and fitness center. All homes are wired for either Comcast or Verizon FiOS High-Speed Internet and Cable. Residents can have up to 2 pets that are under 40 lbs. Located in the heart of Center City, you’re close to everything you need: fabulous dining options such as Butcher & Singer, Marathon Grill, The Oyster House, Harp & Crown, Guiseppe's and Sons, and Elixr Coffee Roasters, only one block away from the incredible shopping Walnut St has to offer. Getting around the city couldn’t be easier as you are steps from a plethora of bus lines, the Broad Street Line subway, and Suburban Station. Please note- these photos are from a previous listing, the window treatments have been replaced with wooden blinds.
1500 Chestnut St #18I

title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.

title: Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing . Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room . Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

Charming 1-Bedroom Residence with a Spacious Rear Deck in Philadelphia's Graduate Hospital Neighborhood. Welcome to your new home nestled in the vibrant and sought-after Graduate Hospital neighborhood of Philadelphia. This delightful 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom residence offers a comfortable and stylish living space, complete with modern amenities and convenient features. One of the highlights of this remarkable property is the rear deck, providing the perfect outdoor oasis for relaxation and entertainment. Whether you're sipping your morning coffee, enjoying an al fresco meal, or soaking up the sun, this private deck is an ideal space to unwind and appreciate the beautiful weather. It offers ample room for outdoor furniture and potted plants, allowing you to personalize the space according to your preferences. Additional features of this residence include central air conditioning to keep you comfortable during hot summer days, laundry facilities conveniently located in the basement, and extra storage space for your seasonal items and belongings. Located in the highly desirable Graduate Hospital neighborhood, this residence offers the best of urban living. title: New construction home for rent in the heart of Fishtown!
description:
Welcome to this stunning, three-year-old new construction home for rent in the heart of Fishtown. Located just half a block away from Girard Ave and the 95 Expressway, this spacious home offers modern luxury and convenience. With a garage included, parking will never be an issue. This home features four bedrooms, four full bathrooms, and over 2500 square feet of living space. The open floor plan, nine-foot ceilings, and two-zone HVAC system ensure comfort and an airy atmosphere. Enter the property through a private entryway or the garage, leading to a welcoming foyer. The first level offers a large bedroom and bathroom, with the bedroom opening onto a private outdoor area. The main level features an open concept kitchen, dining, and living area. The gourmet kitchen includes custom cabinets, quartz countertops, high-efficiency stainless steel appliances, a trash compactor, and a wine fridge. A sliding glass door leads to a private balcony. The third level houses two spacious bedrooms, including the master suite, along with a laundry room and wet bar with a wine fridge. Enjoy stunning views and outdoor entertainment space on the 550 square foot roof deck. The finished basement includes a family room (optional fourth bedroom), full bathroom, and utility room. Additional features of this rental home include a towel warmer in the bathrooms, adding a touch of luxury and comfort. The kitchen is equipped with a trash compactor and a wine fridge, perfect for culinary enthusiasts and wine connoisseurs. The wet bar, located just below the roof deck, also features a wine fridge, making it a convenient space for entertaining and enjoying your favorite beverages. This rental home offers a total living area of 3248 square feet, including the finished basement. Don't miss the chance to rent this exquisite new construction home in the desirable Fishtown neighborhood. Contact us today to schedule a private tour and make this your new home.
1122 E Hewson St

title: Renovated 2BR with outside space
description:
Newly updated property: new kitchen, new bathroom, fresh paint throughout, new doors and more. Lots of great amenities including outdoor space!
The property is the entire 2nd floor of the building. The entrance is in the rear off of Alter Street. There is a corrugated steel fence around the back area with a secure coded gate. Beyond the gate is outdoor space with a table and bbq with lots of room for bike storage. The steel staircase leads to the entrance of unit #2. There is a small outdoor space at the top of the stairs as well.
The kitchen is at the front of the unit- new floors, new cabinets, granite counters, steel appliances, dishwasher and two extra wood counter spaces built into the walls. There is a skylight which bathes the room on a soft daylight. The ceilings in the entire unit are 9ft + high.
The bedrooms are large and open. The windows are large. New blinds have been hung throughout the entire unit.
The bath has been rehabbed with new floors, large sink, mirror storage and wall storage above the toilet. There are two large drawers below the sink. The washer/dryer unit is in the bathroom. The bath lighting unit has a fan, as well.
The living room is large and faces 22nd street. The large windows flood the LR with light in the day time. The windows let the breeze blow straight through the unit. Lots of space to make this room the center of your home.
The unit has a large hallway closet. It got lots of depth and there's a coat hanger/shelf also. There's more storage space built above the washer/dryer- about 5 foot wide X 3 foot deep.
There is one sidewalk parking spot in front of the property.
The pics don't capture all of the updates.
Neighborhood: Thriving! Restaurants abound- Porco's, Dock Street, Las Camaradas, Side Car, Sardine Bar, Chicks, Ynez. Supermarkets- Sprouts, Fresh Grocer and South Street Market. There is a new super market (and CVS) being built into the new construction on the corner of 22nd/Washington, as well. 22nd Street is the northbound thru-way with the bus and dedicated bike lanes. I-76 entrance is nearby. I-95 is a short hop down Washington. The Schulkyll bike path is accessible at South St and provides easy access to Fairmount park.
Owner pays water. Tenant picks up the remainder of the utilities.
This is a quiet building. The tenants are respectful and do their best to not disturb each other. The same courtesy is expected from the new tenants. Quiet time starts at 9PM each night.
Lease is 12 months. Longer term is possible.
Lease requires [Deposit + First Month + Last Month].
Tenants must maintain/take-out their own trash. Cans will be provided for storage in back patio area.
